amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-457 to add the text of H.R. 823, the Colorado Outdoor Recreation and Economy Act to the bill and withdraws, permanently one million acres of public land surrounding Grand Canyon National Park that are already (as of 2012) subject to a 20-year moratorium on new mining claims.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds the text of H.R. 823, the Colorado Outdoor Recreation and Economy Act, to the bill and permanently withdraws one million acres of public land surrounding Grand Canyon National Park that are already (as of 2012) subject to a 20-year moratorium on new mining claims.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 181 (Roll no. 147).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A007) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Neguse.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 181 (Roll no. 147).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 181 (Roll no. 147).
